stem: Given question: What could you do inside but not outside if you have boredom? and answer: hang out at bar, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Most  bars that serve alcohol are inside of buildings, and so, usually, hanging out at a bar is an activity that could only be done inside. Exceptions to the "bars are inside" rule include: rooftop bars, and oceanside bars on beaches.
150_to_200_words:
If you are feeling bored and want something to do, hanging out at a bar can be a great way to pass the time. Being inside the bar gives you access to a variety of activities, such as playing pool, watching sports on TV, or enjoying a few drinks with friends. You can even just sit and chat with others and enjoy the atmosphere.

Going to a bar also gives you the opportunity to explore different types of music, food, and drinks. You can listen to a live band, sample some of the local cuisine, or try a new cocktail. It's a great way to experience the culture of the area and learn a thing or two.

You can also use your time in the bar to meet new people. Bars are great places to socialize and make friends. You can join in with conversations, or just sit back and observe. It's a great way to get to know people from different backgrounds and learn about different perspectives.

Ultimately, hanging out at a bar can be a great way to entertain yourself if you're feeling bored. There's always something to do, something to try, and someone to talk to. It's an ideal way to fill your time and have fun.
